Package org.apache.fop.area.inline

FOP's area tree: inline-level areas

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractTextArea Abstract base class for both TextArea and Character.
Anchor Anchor area for footnote or float.
Character Deprecated. A TextArea with a single WordArea as its child should be used instead.
Container Container area for inline container.
FilledArea Filled area.
ForeignObject Foreign object inline area.
Image Image area for external-graphic.
InlineArea Inline Area This area is for all inline areas that can be placed in a line area.
InlineBlockParent Inline block parent area.
InlineParent Inline parent area.
Leader This is a leader inline area.
Space Inline space area.
SpaceArea A space
TextArea A text inline area.
UnresolvedPageNumber Unresolvable page number area.
Viewport Inline viewport area.
WordArea A string of characters without spaces
